alert.note: Alert for Luzerne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 10:28AM EST until December 21 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Binghamton Washington Street affecting Broome County. Susquehanna River At Waverly/Sayre affecting Bradford and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Bainbridge affecting Chenango and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River At Unadilla affecting Otsego and Delaware Counties. Susquehanna River Near Windsor affecting Broome County. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New York...Pennsylvania... Susquehanna River At Owego affecting Tioga County. Susquehanna River At Towanda affecting Bradford County. Susquehanna River Near Wilkes-Barre affecting Luzerne County. Susquehanna River At Meshoppen affecting Wyoming County. Susquehanna River At Vestal affecting Broome and Tioga Counties. Susquehanna River At Conklin affecting Susquehanna and Broome Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Susquehanna River near Wilkes-Barre. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, US Route 11 in West Nanticoke and River Road in Plainsville begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Bankfull stage is 22.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 25.9 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
